column3: A greasemonkey script that prevents uWaterloo's Desire2Learn from logging you out automatically.
Chrome extension to prevent desire2learn from logging you out when you are not looking. d2lmtfa stands for Desire To Leave Me The F*ck Alone.

column1: Warning: This may or may not be in a working state right now...

column3: d2d is a tool to download all of the content from the University of Waterloo's new learning management system which uses Desire2Learn instead of the old Angel based UWACE.
